description_html:
The Moderne Soaking tub is a mix of angular wall surfaces that allows for a reclining back and a small base that takes up less space than traditional tubs. The contemporary tub is made with the highest quality recycled stainless steel making it sustainable and recyclable and the end of its lifecycle. Double walled and insulated to retain heat, The Moderne is a showpiece statement piece that will be a highlight of the room.
Also available in copper.
72"X 42"X 24"
